* [Privacy Policy](https://cityofcranetexas.com/privacy-policy/)

Crane is a city in the United States, located in the western part of the state of Texas, the administrative center of the county of the same name. According to the 2010 census, the number of residents was 3,353; the U.S. Census Bureau estimated 3,723 people lived in the city in 2016.
